name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. content: Well, considering the location and quality of the apartment, I was thinking of a price of 1200 euros per month. But remember, I'm willing to negotiate. So, what's your offer?

content: Your asking price of 1200 euros per month seems quite high to me, given that the apartment is unfurnished. I was hoping for something more in the range of 900 euros per month. content: I see, 900 euros per month seems a bit low for an apartment of this quality and location. However, I am willing to be flexible. Let's meet in the middle, shall we? I propose 1050 euros per month. This is a fair price for an apartment like this. What do you say?

content: Your counter-offer of 1050 euros per month is more reasonable, and I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your proposal of 950 euros per month is quite low for an apartment of this quality and location. However, I am willing to be accommodating. Let's split the difference, shall we? I propose 1000 euros per month. This is a fair price for an apartment like this. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your new offer of 1000 euros per month is more in line with what I was expecting.
